mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW( REVIEW_NUMBER, P_ID, R_NUMBER, USER_NICKNAME, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_GOOD, REVIEW_BAD, REVIEW_PHOTO, REVIEW_SERVICE, REVIEW_FACILITY, REVIEW_CLEAN, REVIEW_COST, REVIEW_LOCATION ) VALUES ( REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{R_NUMBER}, REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{REVIEW_TITLE}, #{REVIEW_GOOD}, #{REVIEW_BAD}, #{REVIEW_DATE}, #{USER_NICKNAME}, #{REVIEW_PHOTO}, #{SERVICE_RATING}, #{FACILTY_RATING}, #{CLEAN_RATING}, #{COST_RATING}, #{LOCATION_RATING}
